caption.p: Difference in defoliation between A. philoxeroides and the total of the co-occurring native plants in the different communities: ( a) community in which the main species is A. philoxeroides (n = 55), ( b) community in which the main species are native plants (n = 79), ( c) community in which A. philoxeroides abundance is equal to that of the native plants (n = 40).
